activities: Metrus Group receives a limited set of personal information from clients with locations in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland.   Metrus conducts employee surveys, and the information provided is used as part of a broader data analysis which is part of the deliverable for the client.   The employee responses to multiple choice questions are summarized based on pre-determined parameters, for example, country of residence, or position in the organization, and these analyses include a large enough group of responses that no individual respondents’ feedback can be identified.  In no case are survey responses linked back to individual employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, client, customer, including manually processed data
privacyprograms: Metrus Group adheres to the principles set forth in the CASRO code of standards and ethics.
